inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of liver cirrhosis (clinical or by liver biopsy)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Admission due to variceal bleeding occurred 5 to 42 days prior and standard treatment for secondary prophylaxis failed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Confirmed splenorenal shunt, gastrorenal shunt or paraesophageal vein
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Sum of targeted SPSS diameters greater than half the diameter of portal vein
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatic carcinoma and/or other malignancy diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Portal vein thrombosis (≥50% of the lumen)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has liver cirrhosis, grade II esophageal varices, and recent admission for UGIB. He is being treated with lactulose for hepatic encephalopathy.
